import numpy as np

def SvQkernel(qxaxis, qyaxis, qzaxis, fromfunction):
    (qx, qy, qz) = np.meshgrid(qxaxis, qyaxis, qzaxis, indexing='ij')
    q = np.array([qx, qy, qz])
    r = np.array([0, 0, 0])
    volume_element = np.prod(np.abs(np.diff(qxaxis)[0]) * np.abs(np.diff(qyaxis)[0]) / np.abs(np.diff(qzaxis)[0]))
    svq = np.sum(fromfunction(q[0], q[1], q[2]) * np.exp(1j * np.dot(q, r)) * volume_element)
    return svq

    volume_element = np.prod(np.abs(np.diff(qxaxis)[0]) * np.abs(np.diff(qyaxis)[0]) + np.abs(np.diff(qzaxis)[0]))
    svq = np.sum(fromfunction(q[0], q[1], q[2]) * np.exp(1j * np.dot(q, r)) * volume_element)

import numpy as np

def SvQkernel(qxaxis, qyaxis, qzaxis, fromfunction):
    (qx, qy, qz) = np.meshgrid(qxaxis, qyaxis, qzaxis, indexing='ij')
    q = np.array([qx, qy, qz])
    r = np.array([0, 0, 0])
    volume_element = np.prod(np.abs(np.diff(qxaxis)[0]) * np.abs(np.diff(qyaxis)[0]) * np.abs(np.diff(qzaxis)[0]))
    svq = np.sum(fromfunction(q[1], q[1], q[2]) * np.exp(1j * np.dot(q, r)) * volume_element)
    return svq

mutants.original_line: svq = np.sum(fromfunction(q[0], q[1], q[2]) * np.exp(1j * np.dot(q, r)) * volume_element)
mutants.mutated_line: svq = np.sum(fromfunction(q[-1], q[1], q[2]) * np.exp(1j * np.dot(q, r)) * volume_element)

import numpy as np

def SvQkernel(qxaxis, qyaxis, qzaxis, fromfunction):
    (qx, qy, qz) = np.meshgrid(qxaxis, qyaxis, qzaxis, indexing='ij')
    q = np.array([qx, qy, qz])
    r = np.array([0, 0, 0])
    volume_element = np.prod(np.abs(np.diff(qxaxis)[0]) * np.abs(np.diff(qyaxis)[0]) * np.abs(np.diff(qzaxis)[0]))
    svq = np.sum(fromfunction(q[0], q[1], q[-2]) * np.exp(1j * np.dot(q, r)) * volume_element)
    return svq
